results.content: Excellent course! Very thorough. You can tell Evan took his time to put the most valuable content together. A few sections are slightly outdated due to the progress in technology and the ever changing industry, but the underlying principles remain the same.  I think this course delivers on its promise: most viewers should be able to start their agency after taking this course, but keep in mind that the amount of work required and the difficulty involved will be substantial.

results.content: I liked your course. This gave me insights not only about the Web Development Business but also about the modern day principles of Marketing, Project Management and Work Culture.

results.content:
The course was excellent. I have taken a few of Evan's courses and he never fails to impress me with the material covered and most importantly the real life application of concepts covered.

After finishing this course I really feel I can set up my own web development business and be off to the races.

Thanks man, you rock!

results.content:
It has been encoraging to start a web programming company. However it is time to start and learn more as it will run.

Thanks for sharing your experience.
